summary: This Fixes the odd barred up door near the Talos statue in riften
descriptionHtml:
[color=#1e84cc][size=3][u][i][b][font=Verdana]Description:[/font][/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]

This is something that has bugged me for a while,

Riften has a weird wood door, near the thieves guild entrance at the rear of the city.
I bet there is a reason for this, but I don't care, and decided to fix it anyway.

So this mod simply replaces the wood barricade with a fully operational door, [color=#ff7700][size=1]one that opens (-_-([/size][/color]

[color=#cc0000]*This also changes the wall, inside and outside the city a tiny bit, so if for any reason that matters, don't download*[/color]

[font=Verdana][size=3][u][i][b]INSTALL: [/b][/i][/u][/size][/font]

[b][size=3]5 Easy Steps[/size][/b]

[size=3]1.)Download mod
2.)Extract my fix
3.)Place into Skyrim\Data
4.)Load door fix in game,
5.)Enjoy :3[/size]


[font=Verdana][color=#dd7e6b][size=3][u][i][b]Compatibilities/Requirements:[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color][/font]
Â 
No requirements

This is a very minimal change to anything, so there shouldn't be any problems (let me know if you find one while playing)

This mod may conflict with the "Open Cities" mod, But I am unsure as i have not tested this.


[font=Verdana][color=#c27ba0][size=3][u][i][b]Other Mods By Me:[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color][/font]

author: Hangster20
